text: Splice release 0.3.20 is ready for deployment on DevNet

text.text:
:tada: Splice release `0.3.20` is ready for deployment on DevNet, and is available from the GSF
:partydocker: ⅔ of Super Validator nodes have upgraded to this release, including the GSF Super Validator node
*SV node status here*: <https://sync.global/sv-network>
*Release notes here*: <https://docs.dev.sync.global/release_notes.html>

text: <@U05P98G3CTC> FYI :arrow_up:
DMed a realm export
Hey Martin, thanks for getting back so quick! Ah, this is unfortunate news, just wanted to check if this same issue arises if there was a network outage like what is happening tomorrow?

elements.text: Hey Martin, thanks for getting back so quick! Ah, this is unfortunate news, just wanted to check if this same issue arises if there was a network outage like what is happening tomorrow?

text:
Hello, I'm new here and new to Canton networks.  I'm trying to spin up a devnet validator.

I believe my IP was proposed for white listing last week.  However I'm unable to confirm this, because I can't `curl` any of the SV nodes.  I get either `403 Forbidden` or no response (timeout) depending on which nodes I attempt to reach.

The IP I asked to white list is `35.211.249.102`
Some of the URLs I've tried (from that IP according to `<http://ifconfig.me|ifconfig.me>`) include
`curl -X POST <https://sv.sv-2.dev.global.canton.network.digitalasset.com/api/sv/v0/devnet/onboard/validator/prepare>`
`curl -X POST <https://sv.sv-1.dev.global.canton.network.sync.global/api/sv/v0/devnet/onboard/validator/prepare>`
`curl -sSL <https://scan.sv-1.dev.global.canton.network.sync.global/api/scan/v0/scans>`
`curl -sSL <https://scan.sv-2.dev.global.canton.network.digitalasset.com/api/scan/v0/scans>`

These requests just time out.  So I'm not sure if the problem is that my IP isn't whitelisted, or I have the IP wrong, or something else on my end.  Any help is appreciated... thanks in advance.

text: That page suggests `curl`ing one of the `<http://scan.sv|scan.sv>...` URLs in order to determine whether you're whitelisted.  If I understand correctly, it is chicken and egg.  I won't be able to check whether I'm whitelisted until I am whitelisted.
